channel.title: Client problem - 'java' is not recognised
channel.description:
Hello,
I've downloaded a client and extracted it etc. I have done everything right, but when i click "run" it says... 'java' is not recognised as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
Plz help.
Thanks.

item.title: Client problem - 'java' is not recognised
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

Client keeps saying 'java' is not recognized

Did you set your Environmental Variables, if not then go to the help part in the Server Help or Server Tutorial section (can’t remember now) If so, Make sure that the run/compile is going to your java file, like mine is in "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\java.exe"

(Didn’t feel like copying and pasting without quote’s… and didn’t want to type it out)

Read full topic
